metadata.name: iMPERMANENCE
metadata.description:
We believe art is medicine.  

In this project, Jahnny Lee & Sheila Darcey examine the topic of iMPERMANENCE and the duality that exists in the spectrum of emotions it evokes in humans. 

This experimental multi-media piece includes a 1/1 short film NFT and a 1/1 physical piece. This project crosses time and dimension by transcending the mediums of filmmaking and fine art. It also honors our ancestorâ€™s traditions by integrating the four elements in our creative process. iMPERMANENCE pushes the boundaries of self expression and commands a quest to go deeper within ourselves to find our healing journey.

Director | Cinematographer | Editor: J. LEE  
Artist: Sheila Darcey



*Shipping not included.
